00015 namespace Msdn.UIFramework
00016 {
00017     public class Border : UIElement
00018     {
00019         #region fields
00020 
00021         private Color foreground;
00022         private Color background;
00023         private int thickness;
00024         private int cornerRadius;
00025         private LinearGradient brush;
00026 
00027         #endregion
00028 
00029         #region constructor
00030 
00031         public Border()
00032         {
00033             this.background = Color.Transparent;
00034             this.foreground = Color.Transparent;
00035             this.thickness = 1;
00036             this.brush = null;
00037         }
00038 
00039         #endregion
00040 
00041         #region overrides
00042 
00043         protected override void OnRender(Graphics graphics)
00044         {
00045                 Rectangle rc = new Rectangle(this.Left, this.Top, this.Width, this.Height);
00046                 
00047                 // Check if we have rounded corners
00048                 if (this.cornerRadius > 0)
00049                 {
00050                     // Any alpha transparency?
00051                     if (this.Opacity == 255)
00052                     {
00053                         // Do we have gradient?
00054                         if (this.brush == null)
00055                         {
00056                             graphics.DrawRoundedRectangle(this.foreground, this.background, new Rectangle(this.Left, this.Top, this.Width, this.Height), new Size(this.cornerRadius, this.cornerRadius));
00057                         }
00058                         else
00059                         {
00060                             // Draw gradient
00061                             graphics.DrawGradientRoundedRectangle(new Rectangle(this.Left, this.Top, this.Width, this.Height), this.brush.LinearColors[0], this.brush.LinearColors[1], this.foreground, new Size(this.cornerRadius, this.cornerRadius));
00062 
00063                         }
00064                     }
00065                     else
00066                     {
00067                         // Do we have gradient?
00068                         if (this.brush == null)
00069                         {
00070                             graphics.DrawRoundedRectangleAlpha(this.foreground, this.background, new Rectangle(this.Left, this.Top, this.Width, this.Height), new Size(this.cornerRadius, this.cornerRadius), this.Opacity);
00071                         }
00072                         else
00073                         {
00074                             graphics.DrawGradientRoundedRectangleAlpha(new Rectangle(this.Left, this.Top, this.Width, this.Height), this.brush.LinearColors[0], this.brush.LinearColors[1], this.foreground, new Size(this.cornerRadius, this.cornerRadius), this.Opacity);
00075                         }
00076                     }
00077                 }
00078                 else
00079                 {                    
00080                     if (this.Opacity == 255)
00081                     {
00082                         if (this.brush != null)
00083                         {
00084                             graphics.FillGradientRectangle(rc, this.brush.LinearColors[0], this.brush.LinearColors[1], (FillDirection)brush.GradientMode);
00085                         }
00086                         else
00087                         {
00088                             using (Brush localBrush = new SolidBrush(this.background))
00089                             {
00090                                 graphics.FillRectangle(localBrush, rc);
00091                             }
00092                         }
00093                     }
00094                     else
00095                     {
00096                         graphics.DrawRectandleAlpha(this.foreground, this.background, rc, this.Opacity);
00097                     }
00098                 }
00099                             
00100         }
00101 
00102         #endregion

00107         {
00108             get
00109             {
00110                 return this.cornerRadius;
00111             }
00112             set
00113             {
00114                 if (this.cornerRadius != value)
00115                 {
00116                     this.cornerRadius = value;
00117                     this.OnInvalidate();
00118                 }
00119             }
00120         }
00121 
00122 
00123 
00124         public int Thickness
00125         {
00126             get
00127             {
00128                 return thickness;
00129             }
00130             set
00131             {
00132                 this.thickness = value;
00133             }
00134         }       
00135 
00136         public LinearGradient Fill
00137         {
00138             get
00139             {
00140                 return brush;
00141             }
00142             set
00143             {
00144                 if (this.brush != value)
00145                 {
00146                     this.brush = value;
00147                     this.OnInvalidate();
00148                 }
00149             }
00150         }
